primary_recommendation.description: Simple rank-based weighting with equal judge and fan influence
rationale: Rank method is inherently robust to extreme fan vote distributions
Achieves highest Balance score among all tested configurations
Simple to implement and explain to audiences
Naturally compresses extreme values without explicit log transformation

alternative_recommendation.use_case: When producers want more judge influence in later rounds
alternative_recommendation.trade_off: Higher J (+18.8%) at cost of lower F (-13.3%)

key_insights: Rank method outperforms Pct method in 97% of seasons on J metric
Fan vote variability (CV) is 2-3x higher than judge score variability
Dynamic weighting does not provide marginal benefit over Rank 50-50
Log smoothing effect is already captured by rank transformation
